lyrics:
35 contributorstranslationsdeutschun poco loco lyricsverse 1 miguel
what color is the sky ay mi amor ay mi amor
you tell me that its red ay mi amor ay mi amor
where should i put my shoes ay mi amor ay mi amor
you say put them on your head ay mi amor ay mi amor
you make me un poco loco un poquititito loco
the way you keep me guessing im nodding and im yesing
ill count it as a blessing that im only un poco loco

verse 2 hector miguel both
the loco that you make me it is just un poco crazy
the sense that youre not making
the liberties youre taking
leaves my cabeza shaking
youre just un poco loco

bridge ensemble
hes just un poco crazy leaves my cabeza shaking
hes just un poco crazy leaves my cabeza shaking
hes just un poco crazy leaves my cabeza shaking
hes just un poco crazy leaves my cabeza shaking

outro miguel  hector
un poquititititititititititititito locoyou might also like7embed
